Class Game

extends Object
    The Game class holds all game functionalloty of for the card game WAR

    • Method Detail

      • start

        public void start()
        Splits the startDeck into the two decks for the players then shuffles those decks

      • round

        public String round()
        Simulates one round of WAR. checking first if a player is out of the cards and declaring who won if someone is out of cards then it pulls the top cards from each deck and compares then and annouces a winner and puts the in play cards into their deck. if there is a tie the round starts again with the in play cards going to the war piles.
        Returns:
        A string declaring who won and the cards they had or who won the game when someones deck runs out.
